title: Summoner's Name
body: The thing is I recently changed from LAN to NA and mi nick name was already used here (NA) so I had to change my nick name and the one i chose was available but when i logged in my account the nickname was random letters.... Need Help please

replies.body:
Since this is specifically regarding your account and your transfer/summoner name, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
